title: 11. Procrastinating, Lack of Drive, and Lack of Consistency- Let's Talk about It!
description:
Hey Girl Hey

 

Do you find yourself procrastinating, having a lack of drive, and/or a lack of consistency? It is ROUGH out here and believe me you are not ALONE. I've gone through it too and we are gonna get to the bottom of what exactly starts this cycle, tune in!

 

Click here to get the sneak peak to my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
